Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, I need some help with modding. I'm pretty new to this game and the modding process. I was looking at a tutorial that said I needed the Intrepid SLS Rocket, Larger Solid Rocket Boosters, Lunar Landing Module (LEM/LM), and Larger Liquid Fuel Tanks, and also gave me a link to this site. Unfortunately, after a little searching, I haven't been able to find a download page for those mods anywhere. Can anyone give me a link please?

Oh, and if I'm running the demo, will any of those parts work? Thanks.

Being a new guy here myself, i spent some time looking through the Forum: Addon Releases and Projects Showcase section, as it seems to have a lot of different kinds of items.

I haven't gotten to the Mun landing stage, but i'll be there in due time.

Also,

Check out this thread, that has a nice list as well.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/5971-The-Stock-Repository.

Hope that helps.

The reason why you weren't linked to the right place when you followed the link was because of system changes these forums have undergone, so any links that is older than 1 week will just link to the front page.

btw Welcome to the forums
